data.title: Mavis Staples
data.meta_description: Mavis Staples on the 2022 50 Over 50 - Lifestyle - Staples is an American gospel, soul and R&B legend and, at 83, just embarked on another national tour
data.text:
‘The Acolyte’ Reportedly Cancelled Ahead Of Season 2, Which Is No Great Shock

New reporting says that The Acolyte has been cancelled and will not see a second season, something that’s been hazy since the series ended. It never had a chance.

How The Basketball Tournament Evolved From Startup To Summer Tradition

Since its launch in 2014, The Basketball Tournament has become a staple on the summer sports calendar. The concept has expanded to soccer and could apply to other sports.

Get The Skinny On Weight-Loss Drugs

Weight loss drugs are here to stay. Pharmaceuticals, insurance companies, and consumer staples companies are all grappling with the potential ramifications.

Forbes Daily: Target Aims For Discounts As Inflation Hits Summer Staples

Tuesday's edition of Forbes Daily covers Hims' new weight loss drug, Scarlett Johansson and OpenAI, Temu and Shein's impact on trade routes, Memorial Day prices and more.

COUNCIL POST | Membership (fee-based)

'Tailwind' Teams: Improving Community Engagement For Nonprofits

Inspired by the best advice I ever received, here are five best practices we’ve learned in building tailwind teams to help guide your exploration.

How The Founder Of Supernatural Is Making Vegan Sprinkles A Baking Aisle Staple

Meet Carmel Hagen, the founder of the only American-made, all-natural vegan sprinkles brand.

Holiday Gift Guide 2023: The Best Pantry Staples For Foodies

A “Girl dinner” gift set, fancy olive oil and so much more.

10 Best Consumer Staples Stocks In 2024

Consumer staples companies make items you buy consistently. This behavior creates benefits for consumer staples stocks and investors. See our top 10 stock picks for 2024.

Here It Is: Larry Klein’s Tribute To Leonard Cohen

Here It Is: A Tribute to Leonard Cohen, is a Larry Klein produced album for Blue Note that features a jazz ensemble interpreting new arrangements of 12 Cohen songs, with vocals from a wide range of artists including James Taylor, Norah Jones, Mavis Staples, Nathaniel Rateliff, and Peter Gabriel.

Chris Stapleton Leads All-Star Cast As ‘All-American Roadshow’ Hits Wrigley Field

Despite storms in the forecast, Chris Stapleton led an all-star cast as the 'All-American Roadshow' stopped at Wrigley Field, featuring Brandi Carlile, Maren Morris, Amanda Shires and Natalie Hemby as The Highwomen, alongside Jason Isbell, Mavis Staples and Mike Campbell and The Dirty Knobs.

Hot Stove Cool Music Benefit Concert Celebrates 10 Years In Chicago With Mavis Staples

Following two years spent online, the Hot Stove Cool Music benefit concert returns to Chicago's Metro Friday night, featuring performances by Mavis Staples, Juliana Hatfield, Ted Leo, Scott Lucas, Bernie Williams, Peter Gammons and more to benefit the Foundation To Be Named Later.

Fantastic Negrito Talks A2IM’s Libera Awards And Mavis Staples

The American Association of Independent Music (A2IM) will present their annual Libera awards honoring independent artists on Thursday June 17th, 2021.

From Civil Rights To Coronavirus, We’re ‘All In It Together’: Mavis Staples On New Single

Mavis Staples talks about teaming up with Wilco frontman Jeff Tweedy on the new single "All in it Together" and looks back on a career spanning 70 years.

Mavis Staples Addresses The World With Poignant Protest Songs On Stage At Pitchfork

Friday afternoon, despite temperatures nearing 100 degrees during a headlining hometown set at the Pitchfork Music Festival, Mavis Staples, 80, addressed the state of the world over the course of a triumphant hour on stage in Chicago.
